clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Used for induction and maintenance of general anesthesia in adult and pediatric patients for inpatient and outpatient surgery

contraindications.disease: LC sub 50 sub 49881 ppm hr rat LD sub 50 sub 10 8 g kg rat
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Sevoflurane induces muscle relaxation and reduces pains sensitivity by altering tissue excitability with a fast onset of action It does so by decreasing the extent of gap junction mediated cell cell coupling and altering the activity of the channels that underlie the action potential
